altTitles.es: .hack//La leyenda del brazalete de la oscuridad

altTitles.th: .hack//ดอทแฮ็ค ตำนานแห่งกำไลแสงอาทิตย์อัสดง

altTitles.es-la: .hack//La leyenda del brazalete de la oscuridad

description.en:
Welcome to The World, the most advanced online game ever created. Fourteen-year-old twins Rena and Shugo are two middle-school students who enter The World as level-one game characters–and now they're ready to take on anything…or so they think. When Shugo's character dies, he is transported to another level where he is entrusted to bear the Twilight Bracelet by the mysterious Aura. Shugo must find out who Aura is and why she gave him this powerful weapon to protect his sister from the dangers in The World.  
  
The manga has been re-edited in Japan into two big volumes called "Complete Edition" ([I](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201011000008/) & [II](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201010000605/)) including some bonuses and a new short story.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.hack//Legend_of_the_Twilight)

biography.en:
Rei Izumi (依澄れい, *Izumi Rei*) is a Japanese manga artist and illustrator. She was born on April 12th in Iwate Prefecture.

Support The Author:
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/author/34051/) | [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/stores/author/B004LTGOTM/) | [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/search/search.php?name=%E4%BE%9D%E6%BE%84%E3%82%8C%E3%81%84&text_type=author) | [ebook Japan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/lists/authors/56383/)
